title: A Picture Worth a Dozen Words
author: verias
text:
Seems that was quite the explosion, that the shockwave actually shattered all the windows in the Beast.

Just like our ladies here today, I don't really have much to say, so hope you guys enjoy and we'll see you on Thursday.

Keith W.

replies.author: Fairportfan*Guest*
replies.text: "Did the Earth move for you, too?"
